20101211023401.000|20101211023403.500|CCO|GRIPPED THE ENTIRE NATION.
20101211023403.500|20101211023406.000|CCO|ELIZABETH SMART WAS ABDUCTED IN

20101211023408.500|20101211023411.000|CCO|SHE WAS RESCUED NINE MONTHS

20101211023422.667|20101211023424.333|CCO|MURDERS.
20101211023424.333|20101211023426.000|CCO|>> Reporter: MORE THAN EIGHT
20101211023426.000|20101211023427.667|CCO|YEARS AFTER SHE WAS KIDNAPPED AT
20101211023427.667|20101211023429.333|CCO|KNIFEPOINT, ELIZABETH SMART, NOW
20101211023429.333|20101211023431.000|CCO|23, WALKED OUT OF THE FEDERAL
20101211023431.000|20101211023433.500|CCO|COURTHOUSE WITH A VICTORY SHE
20101211023433.500|20101211023436.000|CCO|AND HER FAMILY HAD LONG DESIRED:

20101211023438.500|20101211023441.000|CCO|KIDNAPPER.
20101211023441.000|20101211023442.000|CCO|>> TODAY IS A WONDERFUL DAY AND

20101211023446.000|20101211023447.000|CCO|>> DOESN'T SHE GLOW?

20101211023448.000|20101211023449.000|CCO|THE STAR WITNESS IN THE TRIAL OF
20101211023449.000|20101211023450.000|CCO|57-YEAR-OLD BRIAN MITCHELL, THE
20101211023450.000|20101211023451.000|CCO|DRIFTER WHO HAD CLAIMED THAT GOD

20101211023511.000|20101211023512.667|CCO|CRIMES AGAINST SMART BUT CLAIMED

20101211023519.333|20101211023521.000|CCO|COURTROOM DURING THE FOUR-WEEK

20101211023524.333|20101211023526.000|CCO|OUT OF THE COURTROOM.

20101211023527.667|20101211023529.333|CCO|>> ONE OF THE WITNESSES CALLED
20101211023529.333|20101211023531.000|CCO|IT A SWITCH-- FLIPPED IT ON,

20101211023532.667|20101211023534.333|CCO|>> Reporter: AND JURORS WERE
20101211023534.333|20101211023536.000|CCO|CLEARLY TOUCHED BY SMART'S
20101211023536.000|20101211023537.667|CCO|TESTIMONY.
20101211023537.667|20101211023539.333|CCO|>> ELIZABETH SMART, I THINK
20101211023539.333|20101211023541.000|CCO|SHE'S A WONDERFUL, CAPABLE, VERY
